DOC.brief_title: Trial Aerobic Exercise Patients Undergoing Outpatient Hemodialysis
DOC.detailed_description: Study Design : Prospective , randomize , control trial chronic hemodialysis outpatient within Manitoba Renal Program . Potential patient include individual receiving chronic outpatient hemodialysis Winnipeg ( Seven Oaks , Sherbrook , Central St. Boniface dialysis unit ) Brandon hemodialysis unit . Exercise Interventions : Patients block randomize one follow 2 intervention : Group A : Cycling ergometer GOAL 60 minute 3 time per week hemodialysis 24 week A cycling ergometer place floor front patient 's dialysis chair foot bed ( bed available unit ) . The patient allow exercise anytime first half dialysis treatment . Goal frequency 3 time per week usual schedule hemodialysis treatment . Group B : Pedometers This group receive pedometer ( StepsCountÂ® ) onset study follow exercise test . They educate regard technical use pedometer receive handout entitle `` Pedometer Information Sheet : Get Physically Active One Step Time ! '' They also receive verbal education regard use pedometer goal activity level exercise study supervisor .
DOC.criteria: All adult ( > 18 year old ) patient Treated hemodialysis > 3 month Hemoglobin > 100 g/L previous 2 month Kt/V > 1.2 last month history shorten dialysis due hemodialysis access issue frequent alarm dialysis due poor access eligible study . Study patient must also likely able complete 12 consecutive week exercise ( i.e . travel , change modality , elective surgery plan ) must able comprehend instruction English . Acute medical illness last month Unstable hemodialysis frequent hypotension past month Active cardiovascular disease ( stroke acute coronary syndrome , unstable angina ) last 3 month Lower extremity amputation prosthesis ( inability pedal bike ) Spine compression fracture Severe musculoskeletal pain rest minimal activity Inability sit , stand walk unassisted ( walk device cane allow ) Shortness breath rest activity daily live ( NYHA Class IV ) Labile glycemic control hypoglycaemic episode > 1x/week .
